TopicTitle: [1.11.x] Phoenix Industries (v1.7) [18-DEC-2020] - Cargo ships, Deep Space solutions, EVA Suits, Boosters, and more!

Articles.Content:
Download Link:

 

Preamble:
Hey everyone! I wanted to release any future mods of mine as one bundle instead of separately. Unfortunately, the hard drive containing all of my other mods is long dead and inaccessible, so any new mods going forward are created new-from-scratch. I decided to create a new, single thread for the new mods and to keep things more organized for maintenance and updating. For these reasons, all previous mods are officially no longer supported by me. At least one is graciously being continued by @bcink here: The Martian for KSP.

Description:
This mod contains a small handful of totally re-made parts from my old mods. Currently included are: Two Solid-Rocket-Boosters; one large and one small - Cygnus style cargo spacecraft, one standard and one extended; a Dragon style cargo spacecraft;  EVA suits loosely based on The Martian; stockalike EVA handrails; stockalike 1.25m Xenon fuel tanks; a very powerful ion engine; a simple Arc Reactor module; and Snacks! Greenhouse.

--Both SRB models include emissive textures and animations and will work with stock KSP.

--Ion Engines and Reactor models include emissive textures and animations and will work with stock KSP.

--Xenon fuel tanks models include normal map textures and will work with stock KSP.

--EVA handrails use KSP's PartVariant module to switch between grey and gold textures and will work with stock KSP. They are modeled directly after the handrails on the stock MK1-3 command pod.

--The "Atratus" and "Fawks" spacecraft will work with stock as of KSP 1.11!


--The EVA suits have been completely overhauled and will work with stock KSP.

--The Greenhouse part is intended to recycle Soil and Electricity into Snacks, and in order to add its functionality, you'll need to install Snacks!

Earlier version on Kottabos:

 

Known Issues:
None

Changelog:

Spoiler

v1.7
-Reworked Cargo Resupply Parts (Dragon, Cygnus parts) to use stock KSP inventory system
-Added cargo ability (can be stored in Cargo parts) to Handrail and Greenhouse parts
-Moved Cygnus style parts from Payload to Cargo tab

v1.6
-Added Greenhouse part
-Complete overhaul of EVA Suit textures - they now work with the stock suit switcher and do not require Texture Replacer.
-Added new fun suit textures - Ad Astra, Grey Tiger Stripe, Colonial Marines, and Alien
-Most textures have been converted to .DDS for better loading and compatibility

v1.5.2
-Repackaged to fix missing parts errors and cleaned up the config files

v1.5.1
-Increased cost for each part for balancing
-Increased mass of reactor as a trade-off for free electricity

v1.5
-Added three 1.25m Xenon fuel tanks in 1m, 2m, and 3m lengths
-Added Iron-Man inspired Arc Reactor core module (2.5m) for easy electric charge
-Added super efficient and powerful Ion Engine for fun-sies

v1.4
-Tested against 1.10.1

v1.3
--Added stockalike Dragon parts (Capsule, Heatshield, Trunk, Solar Panel, Shroud, Nosecone, Coupler)
--Tweaked textures for all parts
--Added PartVariant module to Moore Booster, Fawks Trunk, and Fawks Shroud to give option to remove logo

v1.2
--Added EVA handrails!

v1.1
--Fixed Categories icons!
--Fixed texture alignment on Kickback recolor / alternate texture

Great suits! But always want even more suits!

Overall I really enjoy the mod so far and look forward to see what is next. But, I was wondering if you had any plans to make the Atraus modules able to hold materials/supplies such as life support items like snacks/supplies, materials like ore/water/machinery? I would love to send a supply mission of life support materials to a station or ship but also don't want to spend the time constantly attaching and taking off smaller containers filled with those items onto the station or ship to transfer the supplies. In a ideal world it would be similar to how @Angel-125 has some of the mod parts have a set volume with the ability to customize how space is sectioned off for multiple materials or configurable containers. I am saying this without fully understanding how difficult instituting a change that like would be and understand if that is not possible in any way. 

Thank you in advance!

Perhaps, I will try to look into it. As far as I know, that requires the use of B9PartSwitcher. I'll try to see what's involved with that. I'm not sure what mod Angel-125 has done, but I'll take a look.

In other news, I was going along in my playthrough and after a mishap, realized I sorely needed some EVA handrails. I didn't like to use the stock Ladder as an EVA handrail and the old handrails mod is severely outdated. So I decided to try my hand at making my own. The part itself is modeled to the exact specs as the big handrail on the stock MK1-3 Command Pod. I realize the Kerbals don't actually use these handrails but instead the 'ladder' in between them, but I really liked the look of them and wanted to model mine after them.


I also wanted to try to figure out the stock Part Variant system. So the handrails come in either standard Grey or Gold. So far they seem to work as intended, but I want to test them out a bit more before I release them.
Version 1.2 is up, which adds the EVA handrails mentioned before.

Version 1.3 is up, which adds 7 new parts to replicate the SpaceX Dragon spacecraft: Nosecone, Capsule, Heatshield, Trunk, Coupler, Solar Panel, and Shroud. Textures for all parts have been tweaked, most noticeably with the Atratus texture. PartVariant modules have been added to the new Dragon-style Trunk and Shroud as well as the "Moore" Booster to allow users to remove the blue bird logos from the parts.
